Analysis of MSHA Inspections, Violations, and Accident Data
========================================================

```{r chunklabel}
require(reshape)
require(plyr)
require(ggplot2)
require(lubridate)
setwd('~/Code/MSHA/')
```
## Load Data

### Load Mine Data
```{r}
mdat <- read.table('./data/msha_source/Mines.TXT', header=T, sep="|", fill=T, as.is=c(1:59),quote="\"")
head(mdat)
mdat_wv <- subset(mdat, STATE == 'WV' & COAL_METAL_IND == 'C')
```
